ai-patthana21.29:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.29:1.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the cause.
ai-patthana21.29:2.1_0: Not knowing the thought that causes the reason for the sake of sight.
ai-patthana21.29:2.1_1: Not knowing this, the cause or condition for the sake of gaining material possessions.
ai-patthana21.29:3.1_0: Not seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of thought that gives rise to a cause.
